verses.verse: <S%H7751>Run<s%> you to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> through the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H3045>know,<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> in the <S%H7339>broad<s%> places thereof, <S%H518>if<s%> you can <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> there be any that <S%H6213>executes<s%> <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> that <S%H1245>seeks<s%> the <S%H530>truth;<s%> and I will <S%H5545>pardon<s%> it.
And <S%H518>though<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives;<s%> <S%H403>surely<s%> they <S%H7650>swear<s%> <S%H8267>falsely.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> are not your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on the <S%H530>truth?<s%> you have <S%H5221>stricken<s%> them, but they have not <S%H2342>grieved;<s%> you have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them, but they have <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>correction:<s%> they have made their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H2388>harder<s%> than a <S%H5553>rock;<s%> they have <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7725>return.<s%>

Therefore I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H1992>these<s%> are <S%H1800>poor;<s%> they are <S%H2973>foolish:<s%> for they <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> nor the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of their <S%H430>God.<s%>

I will <S%H3212>get<s%> me to the <S%H1419>great<s%> men, and will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them; for they have <S%H3045>known<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of their <S%H430>God:<s%> but <S%H1992>these<s%> have <S%H3162>altogether<s%> <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke,<s%> and <S%H5423>burst<s%> the <S%H4147>bonds.<s%>

<S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> out of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> shall <S%H5221>slay<s%> them, and a <S%H2061>wolf<s%> of the <S%H6160>evenings<s%> shall <S%H7703>spoil<s%> them, a <S%H5246>leopard<s%> shall <S%H8245>watch<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H5892>cities:<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H3318>goes<s%> out <S%H2007>there<s%> shall be <S%H2963>torn<s%> in pieces: <S%H3588>because<s%> their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H7231>many,<s%> and their <S%H4878>backslidings<s%> are <S%H6105>increased.<s%>

<S%H335>How<s%> shall I <S%H5545>pardon<s%> you for <S%H2063>this?<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by them that are <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H430>gods:<s%> when I had fed them to the <S%H7646>full,<s%> they then <S%H5003>committed<s%> <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> and <S%H1413>assembled<s%> themselves by troops in the <S%H2181>harlots'<s%> <S%H1004>houses.<s%>
They were as <S%H2109>fed<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> in the <S%H7904>morning:<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H6670>neighed<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife.<s%>

Shall I not <S%H6485>visit<s%> for <S%H428>these<s%> things? <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and shall not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on <S%H834>such<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> as <S%H2088>this?<s%>

<S%H5927>Go<s%> you up on her <S%H8284>walls,<s%> and <S%H7843>destroy;<s%> but <S%H6213>make<s%> not a full <S%H3615>end:<s%> <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> her <S%H5189>battlements;<s%> for they are not the <S%H3068>LORD's.<s%>
For the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have dealt very <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against me, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

They have <S%H3584>belied<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> It is not he; <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on us; <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall we <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> nor <S%H7458>famine:<s%>
And the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and the <S%H1697>word<s%> is not in them: <S%H3541>thus<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> to them.

<S%H3651>Why<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> you <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word,<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>make<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> them.

<S%H2009>See,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> on you from <S%H4801>far,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> it is a <S%H386>mighty<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> it is an <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> whose <S%H3956>language<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> not, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8085>understand<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> they <S%H1696>say.<s%>
Their <S%H827>quiver<s%> is as an <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6913>sepulcher,<s%> they are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men.

And they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> up your <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and your <S%H3899>bread,<s%> which your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> should <S%H398>eat:<s%> they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> up your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and your <S%H1241>herds:<s%> they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> up your <S%H1612>vines<s%> and your <S%H8384>fig<s%> trees: they shall <S%H7567>impoverish<s%> your <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H2004><s%> you <S%H982>trusted,<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
<S%H1571>Nevertheless<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I will not <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3615>end<s%> with you.

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H3588>when<s%> you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8478>Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things to us? then shall you <S%H559>answer<s%> them, Like as you have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall you <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> in a <S%H776>land<s%> that is not your's.
<S%H5046>Declare<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H8085>publish<s%> it in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> O <S%H5530>foolish<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H3820>understanding;<s%> which have <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> not; which have <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> not:

<S%H3372>Fear<s%> you not me? <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> will you not <S%H2342>tremble<s%> at my <S%H6440>presence,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H2344>sand<s%> for the <S%H1366>bound<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>decree,<s%> that it <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> it: and though the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof <S%H1607>toss<s%> themselves, yet can they not <S%H3201>prevail;<s%> though they <S%H1993>roar,<s%> yet <S%H3201>can<s%> they not <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> it?
But <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> has a <S%H5637>revolting<s%> and a <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> they are <S%H5493>revolted<s%> and <S%H3212>gone.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> they in their <S%H3824>heart,<s%> Let us <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> that <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H1653>rain,<s%> both the <S%H3138>former<s%> and the <S%H4456>latter,<s%> in his <S%H6256>season:<s%> he <S%H8104>reserves<s%> to us the <S%H2708>appointed<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> of the <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>
Your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have <S%H5186>turned<s%> away <S%H428>these<s%> things, and your <S%H2403>sins<s%> have <S%H4513>withheld<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> things from you.

For among my <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> men: they lay <S%H7789>wait,<s%> as he that <S%H7918>sets<s%> <S%H3353>snares;<s%> they <S%H5324>set<s%> a <S%H4889>trap,<s%> they <S%H3920>catch<s%> <S%H582>men.<s%>

As a <S%H3619>cage<s%> is <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5775>birds,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> are their <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they are <S%H6238>become<s%> <S%H1431>great,<s%> and waxen <S%H6238>rich.<s%>

They are waxen <S%H8080>fat,<s%> they <S%H6245>shine:<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> they <S%H5674>overpass<s%> the <S%H1697>deeds<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked:<s%> they <S%H1777>judge<s%> not the <S%H1779>cause,<s%> the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> yet they <S%H6743>prosper;<s%> and the <S%H4941>right<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%> do they not <S%H8199>judge.<s%>

Shall I not <S%H6485>visit<s%> for <S%H428>these<s%> things? <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> shall not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on <S%H834>such<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> as <S%H2088>this?<s%>
A <S%H8047>wonderful<s%> and <S%H8186>horrible<s%> thing is <S%H1961>committed<s%> in the <S%H776>land;<s%>

The <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7287>bear<s%> <S%H7287>rule<s%> by their <S%H3027>means;<s%> and my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> to have it <S%H3651>so:<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> will you <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H319>end<s%> thereof?
